de.oth.blocklib.graphRenderer.AnimatedEntityGraphRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class AnimatedEntityGraphRenderer
extends EntityGraphRenderer
Animates the EntityGraphRendere by showing the direction of the Path.
